title: I need some game suggestions
body:
Three ground rules for suggestions

1)It has to be more addictive than hard drugs
2)It has to be unbeatable or have almost unlimited replayability
3)It has to be a solol/single player game

Please if anyone has any suggestions tell me.

replies.body:
Hatoful Boyfriend - Its a god damn bird dating sim.
AaaaaAAaaaAAAaaAAAAaAAAAA!!! for the Awesome -Its got lots of 'a's in the name.
Lethal League - So you can play League when you don't play League.
Mount Your Friends - for your daily erotic fix.
Harvest Moon. Got addicted to that when I was younger.
